hero_subtitle: Explore how Rossendale Borough Council spends public money. All data comes from publicly available council documents.
publisher_bio: This website was created by Tom Pickup, County Councillor for Padiham & Burnley West and Clowbridge with Dunnockshaw. Reform UK County Councillor and former Lead Member for Finance & Resources at Lancashire County Council, Tom builds transparency tools to make public spending data accessible across Lancashire.
publisher_titles: County Councillor for Padiham & Burnley West
County Councillor for Clowbridge with Dunnockshaw
publisher_quote: It's your money. The more people understand where it goes, the better.
